description: Retrieve a list of files for a given release.
example_request:
GET /api/0/projects/the-interstellar-jurisdiction/pump-station/releases/17642328ead24b51867165985996d04b29310337/files/ HTTP/1.1
Host: sentry.io
Authorization: Bearer <token>
example_response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 230
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
Content-Language: en
Vary: Accept-Language, Cookie
Link: <https://sentry.io/api/0/projects/the-interstellar-jurisdiction/pump-station/releases/17642328ead24b51867165985996d04b29310337/files/?&cursor=100:-1:1>; rel="previous"; results="false"; cursor="100:-1:1", <https://sentry.io/api/0/projects/the-interstellar-jurisdiction/pump-station/releases/17642328ead24b51867165985996d04b29310337/files/?&cursor=100:1:0>; rel="next"; results="false"; cursor="100:1:0"
Allow: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS
X-Frame-Options: deny
Content-Type: application/json

[
  {
    "dateCreated": "2018-11-06T21:20:19.150Z", 
    "dist": null, 
    "headers": {
      "Content-Type": "text/plain; encoding=utf-8"
    }, 
    "id": "1", 
    "name": "/demo/message-for-you.txt", 
    "sha1": "2ef7bde608ce5404e97d5f042f95f89f1c232871", 
    "size": 12
  }
]

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the release belongs to.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

path_parameters.description: the slug of the project to list the release files of.
path_parameters.name: project_slug

path_parameters.description: the version identifier of the release.
path_parameters.name: version

title: List a Project Release's Files
